channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Winter Olympics are upon us. Here's how to follow along

item.title: Trump grants tariff breaks to 'politically connected' companies, Senate Dems say
item.description: The White House's trade policy has "opened the door to corruption," according to a letter from Ron Wyden and Chris Van Hollen.

item.title: Will calls to 'abolish ICE' sway voters in 2026? The strategy has Democrats split

item.title: You owe it to yourself to go on a solo trip. Here's how to plan one
item.description: Traveling on your own can be scary, but it can be one of the most meaningful things you can do for yourself. Three solo travelers share their experien...

item.title: Athletes to watch from Team USA at the Winter Olympics
item.description: American athletes are preparing for the 2026 Milano Cortina Winter Olympics. These are some of the top Team USA competitors to watch.

item.title: Former Capitol Police officer Harry Dunn running for Congress
item.description: Former Capitol Police officer Harry Dunn — who emerged as a national figure after the Jan. 6 riot — announced a second bid for Congress on Wednesday.

item.title: Israeli strikes kill 17 in Gaza, hospitals say, after soldier wounded by gunfire
item.description: Hospitals say six children were among those killed in strikes that Israel's military says it launched after a gun attack on its troops.

item.title: Collision with Greek coast guard boat leaves 15 migrants dead
item.description: The coastguard said a pursuit was under way at the time of the collision, near the island of Chios.

item.title: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
item.description: The UK leader's comments came after Russia renewed its attacks on power plants and critical infrastructure in Ukraine.

item.title: Leader of South Africa's second largest party will not seek re-election
item.description: The surprise move may threaten the stability of the coalition government of which the DA is a key partner.

item.title: Woman tells trial of Norway royal's son she suspects she was drugged
item.description: The first alleged victim gives further evidence in Marius Borg Høiby's trial for rape and other alleged offences.

item.title: Signs of forced entry found at Arizona home of ‘Today’ show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother
item.description: Investigators have found signs of forced entry at the Arizona home of “Today” show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother.

item.title: Immigration agents draw guns and arrest activists following them in Minneapolis
